[TENDER OPPORTUNITY]## Boiler Repair Services
### Overview

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites you to bid on a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for boiler and furnace repair services for the Department of National Defence. The contract will be administered by PSPC on behalf of the Department of National Defence.

### Tender Details
- **Tender Number**: WS4566765322
- **Request Number**: W684H-240212
- **Closing Date and Time**: 12 June 2024, 2:00 PM EDT

The RISO contract is expected to commence from 15 July 2024 or upon the issuance of the Standing Offer and end on 14 July 2025. Three one-year optional periods will also be considered.

### Services Required

The successful bidder shall be responsible for providing all labour, material, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision required to perform various types of emergency and operating repairs to boilers, plant equipment, and related distribution systems at various areas of CFB Halifax.

### Security Requirements

Reliability is one of the security requirements associated with this tender opportunity. Applier companies must have a valid security clearance to be eligible for this tender.

### Jurisdiction

This tender opportunity is subject to the provisional application of the WTO GPA and many Free Trade Agreements Canada has with various nations. A list of trade agreements included in this tender opportunity is outlined below.

### Key Documents and Information
- **Contact**: Chantal Blanchard (PSPC)
- **Contact Email**: chantal.blanchard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Link to Tender Notice**: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19725958>
